text:
Alex Sabundu Badeh (November 7, 1957 – December 18, 2018) was a Nigerian politician and general. He was a four star flag officer of the Nigerian Air force. He was the 18th Chief of Air Staff and the 15th Chief of Defence Staff of the armed forces of Nigeria from 2014 to 2015.
Badeh was shot dead while driving near Abuja on December 18, 2018 at the age of 61.
